summary: Website project for vinodelectricals.com with a publicly reachable /admin area secured by a simple password and an admin dashboard to view/manage site content and client quote responses; also needs custom domain setup so www.vinodelectricals.com loads the site.
architectural_notes: Admin authentication is a single password field (no username/name collection).
Admin route is publicly reachable at /admin; access controlled by password harsh600606.
known_issues: /admin not accessible / shows 'only authorised access' to the user; needs rebuild/deploy so password login works.

existing_features.title: Update the /admin experience so it no longer requires Internet Identity login and no longer prompts for a name/profile; instead, show a password-only login form and grant access when the password equals exactly "harsh600606".

Update the admin dashboard UI to fetch and display the quote replies (contact/quote submissions: name, phone, email, message, date) after successful password login, and remove the current 'Access Denied / Only authorized administrators' blocking state for password-authenticated users.

Persist the successful admin password session on the client so that refreshing the page or navigating away/back to #/admin during the same browser session does not require re-entering the password; provide a clear 'Log out' action that clears the session and returns the user to the password prompt.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create publicly accessible /admin page with password-only login (no name/profile prompts) using password harsh600606
Admin dashboard to view client quote responses (quotes replies) after successful login
Admin dashboard to manage all site content (quotes, images, text sections, etc.)
Set up custom domain so www.vinodelectricals.com loads the deployed website (DNS/domain connection)

Add a backend API that allows fetching the stored contact/quote submissions using the shared password "harsh600606" so that the admin dashboard can load submissions without Internet Identity admin permissions.

projectName: Replace Internet Identity admin gate with password-only login and show quote replies after login
